userTable: CREATE TABLE users (id CHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, username VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
todosTable: CREATE TABLE todos (id CHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, isCompleted BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, isUpdated BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
migrationsTable: CREATE TABLE migrations (migrationName VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
